title: Social Conservatism is stupid
body:
You can believe whatever you want economically, personally I take a centrist position because neither extreme seems to have it right.

But if you believe that the government should be in the business of telling individual people what they can and cannot do when the decisions those people make aren't harming anyone else, you're an idiot. The law should exist to protect people from other people and for no other reason, and **this applies equally to Gay Marriage as it does to laws telling me I have to wear a bike helmet**. Individual people have the right to do whatever the hell they want with their lives. You can't claim to believe in freedom if you don't agree with that.
